Reviews.Title: Excellent small and inexpensive TV/monitor
Reviews.Author: SB Leo
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to use as a small TV that I could carry around and also to use as a computer monitor sometimes. I was not surprised to see it looked very similar to my Samsung TVs because I read from a few websites that it was built with Samsung OEM parts. Even the menu and the setup were very much the same as those on the Samsungs. OTA HDTV quality was decent for a 720p TV of this size. SDTV channels looked better than I could get from the VSonic LCD TVs I also own. Sound quality was excellent considering the small size of the TV and the speakers. The audio was clear and loud even on the default settings. Besides the VGA input, the HDMI input and coaxial digital audio output were the nice bonuses that I didn't believe I could get with a 15''/15.6" TV but this TV has them all. With a cheap antenna, I could get more than 50 DTV channels in the city. The TV looks very slick in glossy piano black. When used as a monitor, I was very pleased with the 1366x768 screen I got from my laptop via the VGA connector. I also tried the HDMI connection with my desktop and it looked excellent, too. Overall, I would highly recommend this TV to those who are shopping for a 15" TV. Another plus is it has a 16:9 aspect ratio (which I prefer) and not the 16:10 that most other 13 to 19" TVs have.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: Benjamin
Reviews.Content: Gee, some of the reviews here had me a bit nervous about purchasing this little tv, but I sure am glad I did.  Maybe these folks were expecting to plan a Super Bowl party around the little fella and were shocked that it doesn't compare to a Samsung 50 inch with surround sound?  For $100 I can't imagine doing better than this unit.  I bought it for our kitchen about three weeks ago and it's been perfect.  I even purposely held-off on my review in case it blew-up or the sound went out or it started summoning the undead, etc..  Nope - it pretty much does exactly what I bought it to do.The picture is great - nice and sharp.  I did see what people meant about the sight lines fading a bit if you get too far away, but this was easily corrected by veerry slightly tilting the unit upwards on the swivel stand which comes with it.  Our kitchen isn't exactly huge, but I can wander from one end to the other and see the picture just fine.  The sound is a total non-issue.  It's precisely the sound you'd expect from a 15" tv if you're a realistic person.  I've never even had to turn it up all the way.I honestly think you'll enjoy this tv just fine.

Reviews.Title: Barely acceptable
Reviews.Author: Terry1022
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for the cheapest, barely acceptable video component ... you found it. I bought this strickly because I have a limited budget and this met it. The colors are washed out on all the settings. The available angle of view is difficult if you are using this in an area like a kitchen. Probably no more than 50 degrees of working angle.The unit worked for approximately a month and a half. Shut it of one night come back the next day and the remote doesn't work ... at all. After trying a new remote it's been diagnosed as a bad remote reciever in the TV.... not acceptable on a unit that is only a few weeks old. All in all it's a stretch to give it 2 stars.Amazon was really great in offering to replace or refund. After looking on line at other issues with the brand, I've decided to spend the extra $30 and buy, from Amazon, a name brand I have confidence in.SPEND THE EXTRA $$$$.........

Reviews.Title: Coby TFTV1525 15-Inch Widescreen TFT LCD 720p HDTV/Monitor with HDMI Input (Black)
Reviews.Author: R. Small
Reviews.Content: This is a solid product (keeping the price in mind). I bought this tv to use with my PS3. At first I was disappointed with the way it look (was using the original rca cables), but once I plugged in the HDMI cable everything was pretty clear. I would recommend this tv to anyone who is looking for a cheap product that with still perform

Reviews.Title: Perfect Little TV
Reviews.Author: SandeeSKS
Reviews.Content: I could not be happier with this purchase. The picture is great, operation is simple and it looks just great in the corner on my kitchen counter.  Makes dishes and meal prep so much more enjoyable. Nice little price for a great little TV!

Reviews.Title: Great Value, Great TV

Reviews.Title: Excellent - except for sound
Reviews.Author: Vicki Delalla
Reviews.Content: Instant set-up; picture is excellent - near HD quality, even without HD satellite hook-up (using DirecTV). Unit is light-weight and easy to move or position. Only negative is the speaker at the bottom - with sound aimed downward at whatever it's sitting on, it does sound a bit tinny. It is more obvious when first turning on the TV; after awhile one becomes used to it. Not sure what possesses manufacturers to position the speakers that way. I recently purchased a computer monitor with speakers - same problem. But overall, it is still a good buy, and depending on what one watches, the picture quality may be more important than the sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Colby flatscreen TV - Model TFTV1525 15" Widescreen
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I bought this 'cause the price was right.  I bought it for my guestroom.  The picture is really good but the sound is terrible.  It's no better than an AM Radio.

Reviews.Title: Good little HD TV
Reviews.Author: FJD
Reviews.Content: Got this to replace a dead  3yr old Sharp 13in we have in the kitchen. The Coby is great for the price. Picture quality is very good with HD broadcast. Tuner is very sensitive and captures a lot more channels than I expected without a cable box attached. The viewing angle is moderate, but come on, this set is inexpensive and should not be judged by High End standards.Sound quality is what you'd expect for a set this size. Not bad, not great.Controls are well laid out on the remote. Fav channel button is handy. All around a good buy for under $125!

Reviews.Title: QAM Tuner Issue !!
Reviews.Author: J. Russell "ex-chef/current engineer"
Reviews.Content: This is a decent little tv.  Sound is OK, picture is good.  However, If you're purchasing this TV to avoid an additional cable box and receive unscrambled digital cable stations via your coaxial cable directly through the QAM tuner....It won't work.  The coaxial input only routes through the analog tuner (verified with Coby Tech support).  Otherwise this is a good HDTV for the price.  For my intended use...I had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Coby 15" LCD TV worth every Penny spent.
Reviews.Author: Von Preussen "kaiserlichehoheit"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Coby 15" TV because I couldn't resist the price.  Although I didn't need a Television the price took me in.  Well after unpacking and setting up the little Set.  I must say how impressive the Picture Quality is.  The colors are crisp sharp and the Image on Screen looks amazing.  I own 6 HDTV Televisions the largest is 42" Screen Set.This little Coby has great color just as much as my larger screen TV.  Also the 5 Year Warranty I got on the Coby TV for a few Dollars more made the purchase even better.I have read on Amazon as well as the Internet the many people find the sound to be somewhat Tinny.  I haven't noticed that at all.  The sound can be adjusted to the liking of the Person viewing the Set.I am using my little Coby Television with HDTV Cable and the setup was easy and I even got the Cable Box programed to work the TV.  Allowing me to turn it on ,  adjust the volume etc.  No problems.  Anyway anyone looking for a small HDTV for under $100.00 USD should def. purchase this little Gem.  It looks awesome and the Quality of the Product is great...My other sets are:  Samsung,  Vizio,  Poloroid,  and Emerson.

Reviews.Title: Coby t.v. review
Reviews.Author: mikediehl
Reviews.Content: we just purchased two of these t.v.s for our childens bedroom.  We are very PLEASED!  So pleased we ordered another one for our bedroom.  Great little t.v.!  so happy I didn't listen to the negative reviews!

Reviews.Title: Coby  15''
Reviews.Author: Anita
Reviews.Content: We are a bit disappointed with the quality of the picture we are getting. Thepicture is quite dark and  our efforts to adjust the settings last for a shorttime only and then it revertes back to being dark. As of right now, I do notrecommend this product and I would not buy another one like it.

Reviews.Title: Decent tv for price
Reviews.Author: Jennifer E. Traynor "mom of 3"
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a decent tv for a kids' bedroom or corner of a kitchen.  The picture quality isn't the best - if you're sitting on the floor or below the level of the tv, the screen looks dark & you need to adjust the brightness.  I use this in my boys' bedroom & they mainly play videogames on it, so for that purpose, it's fine.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, abominable sound.
Reviews.Author: Larry Ross
Reviews.Content: I needed a very inexpensive HDTV to replace a 13" rgb I have used in my kitchen for umpteen years. During Hurricane Irene, the Meteorologist was pointing off the screen somewhere and then I knew I needed a screen with a 16x9 ratio.Ok. Picture with some tweaking of the brightness and contrast is better than I expected. I also chose the picture to be warm. Really, really good. Much better than I anticipated, but this is day one, we'll see.The sound? HORRIBLE, just like the other reviewers have said. My workaround? I picked up a pair of Logitech speakers for $11.88 at Walmart and plugged them into the headphone jack on the back of the TV. I set the sound to "theater" in the setup and problem is solved.It will not put out air bleeding volume as the tv over rides the volume control on the speakers, but it is plenty loud for my usual viewing. If I want to get blasted out of my chair, I go into the living room and turn on the home theater.Because Colby is known as a low end electronics company, I will probably buy a three year warranty from Squaretrade for about $15.00. I just have no feel for the longevity of this TV. For about a penny a day, I'll have peace of mind or, is it worth 15% of the cost of the tv? Decisions, decisions.

Reviews.Title: Steph's TV
Reviews.Author: Jane L. Gillis
Reviews.Content: I gave this TV to my granddaughter because we bought the same one for ourselves.  We like it very much - clear picture and good sound.  it fits well on our kitchen counter and will be good for her dorm room at college.

Reviews.Title: Coby Yes or No
Reviews.Author: Shetland Sheepdog
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Coby TV because I've heard great things about it.  Sorry to say I am very disappointed with it and cannot recommend it to anyone else. The sound and image quality are poor. I have cablevision and it cannot be programmed to the remote so I need to use both remotes. It's somewhat frustrating.I received this from the seller packed very well and earlier than expected.I am always very possible about products but this is below average. Sorry.

Reviews.Title: THIS TV IS FANTASTIC!
Reviews.Author: kiya redick
Reviews.Content: I put this tv in my kitchen and it is PERFECT! the audio is the perfect the size is perfect and the price is DYNOMITE!!!. i would strongly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Joe S. Patterson "BUZZY"
Reviews.Content: The only draw back is you have to be looking straight on to get good picture and color.  In the installation that I have it works fine because I use it as a computer monitor when I am working on a computer.  Over all it is a great buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: coby 15in lcd
Reviews.Author: pumpkin
Reviews.Content: Im very happy I purchased this tv at first I had my doubts because of some of the reviews.  I purchased this set for my son and it works great.  Its about 1 1/2 months and no problems. I have a dvd plug in to it and I also us it for a monitor for my netbook. this tv has wonderful features.  the picture is great all of the setting are easy to use.  the manuel was informational about the product and different hookups.  The sound is not great but for 100. it works for me.  I would purchase a coby tv again.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Skenjovi
Reviews.Content: The first one I got had problems, but I returned it for another.This is a great TV. The side viewing angle isn't the best, but is good.The Picture is clear and the sound is good.Great TV for the money.

Reviews.Title: Like the size nothing else
Reviews.Author: diane e moore
Reviews.Content: I needed a TV that fit in a 17" space. This TV does that. The picture is ok if you are standing right in front of it and about 6' are further away. If you are too close or off to the side it turns dark. And the sound is not very good either. If I had a larger space I would not have kept this TV.

Reviews.Title: Hate Coby TV.
Reviews.Author: Richard Etter
Reviews.Content: The set started out never getting a signal.  Now, it won't even power up.  We have pretty much given up on it.

Reviews.Title: Impressive little TV
Reviews.Author: Matthew R. Stengel
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these last year so I could watch the football playoffs at work.  I was going to buy a DTV converter for 50 bucks and hook it up to an old CRT tv, but for just a little more, I could buy this TV.So, I did.I got the TV because it had VGA and HDMI inputs, I could hook my workstation computer up to it, and it was perfectly camouflaged.  Using a simple antenna, I was able to effortlessly pull in all my local TV affiliates and their DTV subchannels.  I was getting about 25 channels over the air for free.  I was able to effortlessly switch between the football game and the computer, in case my supervisor came by.The picture is fantastic.  Extremely crisp, HD, accurate colors, and very sharp resolution.  The games looked beautiful on this thing (again, using OTA antenna).  The sound is nothing special, but it's more than adequate for any normal sized room.  My only complaint with the picture is that when you don't look at it straight-on, the picture goes a bit photo-negative, making odd viewing angles challenging.Another thing I like is that this TV is extremely portable.  I've taken it to and from work, outside, to tailgates, and it just works well each time.  Because its so small and flat, I'm able to set it up virtually anywhere.  When I was laid up after surgery in my small bedroom, I fit this tv, along with a videogame system on a small dresser.  It's really convenient.Finally, the price is fantastic.  I can't find any other 720p HDTV for this price point.  That was what really sold me on it.  I was worried that it might be a cheap piece of junk, but I have been quite satisfied with my purchase.So, if you need a TV that goes anywhere, has great clarity, and gets HD...save yourself some cash and buy this one.  I did, and it was completely worth it.

Reviews.Title: I Love This Little TV
Reviews.Author: Douglas King
Reviews.Content: I do not understand some of the negative reviews about this TV.  It made me reluctant about purchasing one.  But based on the good reports of most people I went ahead and bought it.  Well let me tell you this is one nice little TV.  The picture is great.  The sound is not real good out of the box but when reset to Theater mode it sounds great.  It has a full set of connections on the back and the case looks very elegant for a tiny little set.  It even has a little light built in.  I mean what do you want for this price?!?!?!?!!!!  The viewing angle is not bad at all; it would be nice if the screen were adjustable up and down, but then the thing is so light and small that you can tilt it if you want by putting something under the stand.  The remote is easy to use; the controls are easy to use; the setup took one minute.  Add a three year Square Trade warranty for 15 bucks and you can't beat it if you're worried.  No, I don't work for these guys.  I have another 15 inch made by Dynex.  That one is fine but this one is better.  Would I recommend it to my best friend?  You bet.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: Flesh Tones
Reviews.Author: Ralph
Reviews.Content: The flesh tones cannot be adjusted properly on this receiver.You cannot adjust for the red hues you should see in flesh tones. In all other aspects this is a great receiver.

Reviews.Title: Aspect Ratios limited in HDMI mode
Reviews.Author: The Good and the Bad
Reviews.Content: Beware - when connecting this TV with an HDMI cable, THERE ARE ONLY TWO CHOICES FOR THE ASPECT RATIO - normal and wide.  Zoom and Cinema are "grayed out" and cannot be chosen.  I called Coby tech support about this and was told that Zoom and Cinema are NOT choices when using an HDMI cable on this model. Gee...would have been nice if they had listed that in the features or specs.  Since I am running cable through the wall, using component and audio cables would be bulky and difficult.  My other TV's HDMI cable has all four aspect ratios available, so I never would have guessed this would be a problem. Coby TFTV1525 15-Inch Widescreen TFT LCD 720p HDTV/Monitor with HDMI Input (Black)

Reviews.Title: Fine little budget tv
Reviews.Author: Allie122
Reviews.Content: This tv is great for what you would expect at this size and price.  While I wouldn't recommend it as a main tv in the family room, it is perfect for the kitchen / garage / gym, which is what I think most people would order it for.  Picture is fine; sound is not great but good; price can't be beat.  Delivery took only 3 days!  If you have reasonable expectations and a small budget, don't be afraid to try it out.

Reviews.Title: The product has been improved...
Reviews.Author: Hyounsoo Kim "Hank"
Reviews.Content: First of all, this TV is not the best quality TV. But if you reduce you expectation littl bit, it will be your best choice.I read many reviews and I found out that a couple of issues already have been fixed.1. COBY Logo: It never comes again whenever you turn on the tv.2. Black level: Balck level is very impressive in this price range. It is not the best but very OK!3. Channel delay: Changing channels takes about 2 seconds, not 5 seconds. If you are very sensitive, it would be annoyed, but I'm OK with it.This TV is the only one that povides very clear display and sound in this price. If you pay for 100 bucks to buy this, It would be one of your best choice ever.

Reviews.Title: An OK TV for those with limited space and  limited $$
Reviews.Author: Duevalvduc "DUEVALVDUC"
Reviews.Content: Purchased to run composite video feed from my daughter's Barbie DVD player in her bed room. Perhaps the picture with composite feed is a particular weakness of this TV but it's not a lot worse than the old tube TV it's replacing. I'm guessing that the picture greatly improves  with a higher resolution feed but one thing that won't change is its relatively weak contrast and its very poor visibility from off-center. It works for my daughter as she is the only one watching it and can easily center herself for the best picture.

Reviews.Title: Did not Work.
Reviews.Author: Willie Combs
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV to replace a Analog TV in our Motor Home, It was the right size and we liked the looks of it. After we received it and unpacked and hooked it up no voice no Picture no anything, now I got to repack and mail it back I know things happen never the less was not a Happy Camper.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Product
Reviews.Author: Mark McDevitt
Reviews.Content: Do not buy.  I purchased and the tv NEVER worked.  I only wanted it for my kitchen, tried different cables, connections ,etc., never even got any kind of picture.  Through my own fault, I waited until now to do anything about it.  I called Coby this AM and they told me I only had a 90 day warranty, which already expired.  So I have zero remedy.  Who only gives a 90 day warranty for a tv?  Complete waste of money, I would not buy anything from Coby

Reviews.Title: Works very good
Reviews.Author: V. Watson "tv watcher"
Reviews.Content: Wow, deivery was very fast.  Doing business with Amazon is the best!!!  I do not have this TV hooked up to an HD cable yet but using regular cable, the picture is very good. Sound is very good.  So far, absolutely no complaints for this product, that's why it got 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great price, horrid TV
Reviews.Author: Cannabis Connoisseur
Reviews.Content: Here's the bottomline: if you don't mind dealing with a television that can only be properly viewed if you sit directly in FRONT of it then this TV is for you. I purchased this television for my kitchen and it was so bad due to the viewing angle that I had to immediately return it. There probably is somewhere between a 40-60 degree view angle, anything more than that is pointless - you won't be able to see anything. Other than that it's cheap and does what it's supposed to do except give you a proper viewing experience. Oh and yea, the speakers are crap alright.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm!
Reviews.Author: Mercuria
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV since Dec 2010 and it's now Dec 2013 and I have not had a problem with it.Oddly, last night the remote broke but honestly, that's no big deal. (yes I tried new batteries)For a mere $100 I got a great deal, and I've enjoyed using this TV every day.  It's the perfect size for a bedroom!Edit to add:  the remote works again!  Something must have gotten knocked loose.  So yeah, great TV! :D

Reviews.Title: worst ever
Reviews.Author: Anne
Reviews.Content: My daughter bought this television as a gift for me exactly two years ago.  Last week the picture went out.  The sound still works, but no picture. She didn't buy it on Amazon.  I still had the receipt, and I called the store where it was purchased, and was told that I had to call Coby the manufacturer.  They gave me the phone number. I called Coby and the recorded message stated if customer service is needed to go on their website. I tried to email customer service on their website and a message said something to the effect that you can't send any emails now.  I even tried to call their corporate office in New York and received a steady busy signal. It's very clear to me that they really don't want to hear from their customers.  I ended up having to buy a new television.  Buyer beware, you really do get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Coby TFTV television
Reviews.Author: AUGUST SHINWALD
Reviews.Content: Two years until the unit failed.  No picture !  No sound !  Used professional test equipment to make my decision.  Note:  The Amazon cost of this TV on Nov 2011 price was $ 114,  NOW  August 2013 cost is $ 249.  Pretty good jump in price for less than 2 years of service,  then failure.

Reviews.Title: Good Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: Richard K. Moore
Reviews.Content: This Coby replaces one that was all of nine months old when it gave up the Ghost.  I don't know what happened, but it killed the DirecTV box at the same time.  A whole house surge protector and a small surge protector has been installed on the outlet it is plugged into.  The DirecTV box has died again, but the TV is still working, well.

Reviews.Title: Nice unit
Reviews.Author: DHD
Reviews.Content: This is used as the monitor for rearview camera on my travel trailer. In this role this is an excellent display and the only thing keeping me from rating it 5 stars is the hokey start up where it displays its own advertising logo.

Reviews.Title: great tv for small room
Reviews.Author: lburton817
Reviews.Content: Great little Tv for small bedroom. Easy to set up and use. My son (age 9) loves it! I love that it's well priced. Easy remote too'

Reviews.Title: Small TV good value for size
Reviews.Author: JagWire "JAG"
Reviews.Content: Use this TV in the kitchen on a shelf where small size is important.  Smallest LCD TV I could find; price reasonable.  Picture is excellent; have used for some time and no problems.  Previous reviews noted "tinny" sound - confirmed that, but in the kitchen, watching news / sports, it's fine.  If audio quality is important, get powered speakers.  Only other problem is it is not recognized by Comcast remote so have to use both original and comcast to change channels on cable TV.  Not perfect but best solution for our need.

Reviews.Title: Bought for bathroom
Reviews.Author: Eric Rauch
Reviews.Content: This TV works fine for the purposes I bought it.  We mounted it high on the wall on a bracket so it could be adjusted as needed.  The only complaint is that my sink is very close to the unit and the angle is steep so I don't get a good picture.  However, from the rest of the room it's great and from my wife's sink (it's farther away) the picture is great.  It works fine for the purpose we bought it.

Reviews.Title: COBY LCD TV - Worthless and very frustrating
Reviews.Author: Michael Kimery
Reviews.Content: This TV is the worst thing I've ever had to deal with.  It just gives a blank screen whenever it feels like it.  We have changed cable boxes, remotes and how it is being powered; nothing helps it.  I wouldn't wish this piece of crap on anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Joe Shovel
Reviews.Content: I love my new little tTV.  I have it next to my computer monitor so I can watch it while computing.  The angle of the screen, which is adjustable, is critical to having a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Died
Reviews.Author: James Allen
Reviews.Content: Died completely 90 days after purchase Buyer beware before you purchase decide how long you'd like the picture and sound to last!

Reviews.Title: Coby TF-TV1525
Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: I have to agree with others who stated that the picture on this TV is fine, but the sound could be much better.  Also, I am currently waiting on a repair part because the remote control 'eye' on the TV is not working, rendering the remote useless.

Reviews.Title: Coby 15" tv
Reviews.Author: Walter Frutiger "tiger"

Reviews.Title: didn't work at all and returned
Reviews.Author: YUKARI
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 sets for my vacation house. One didn't work at all. I called the service and decided to return both. I re-ordered Japanese brand instead.

Reviews.Title: OK for the money, turns on by itself, headphone jack on BACK.
Reviews.Author: J. Harrison
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit about a year ago to replace a dead CRT type TV that we'd been using in our kitchen.It works fine, and has an acceptable picture, plus the price was good, especially with free prime shipping.The only somewhat bizarre characteristic I've noted is that the unit often turns itself on when we turn on the lights in our kitchen!!  We've got a track lighting system with five compact fluorescent lamps installed.  The pulsations from the lamps, at start-up, must simulate the IR pattern that the remote control sensor uses for the "on" command!  At first, we thought the darned thing was just coming on at random, but then it became obvious that whenever this happened, it was always associated with having turned the Kitchen lights on.The TV takes quite a while to turn on (or off) after giving it the command, so that's why it wasn't obvious immediately that it was switching on the lights that was turning the TV on.Another somewhat annoying design issue is that the jack to accept headphones is on the back of the TV with the other connectors.  When someone wants to watch without bothering someone else, they have to pull the TV out to them, turn it around, and then find the little jack to plug the headphones in.  It would be enormously easier if the jack was on the front as it almost always is on other TVs.  And using an extension cable doesn't solve the problem because plugging the 'phones into the jack disconnects the speaker, and unplugging them reconnects it.  And that's an important feature since the whole point of using the headphones is to silence the on-TV speaker.  So that is something that's proven to be an issue for our purposes.  If you never intend to use the headphone jack, then having it on the back won't be of any consequence.

Reviews.Title: nice TV
Reviews.Author: pgailc
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my kitchen. I like everything about it except for the sound. I had to purchase eternal speakers for a better quality sound.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Kenroy
Reviews.Content: This TV purchase was returned.  The picture totally faded away/disappeared after a few minutes after  turning the TV set on for viewing.

Reviews.Title: Small, but good quality
Reviews.Author: Robin
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my son's room.  It is small, but it has a great picture, surprisingly good quality sound and can be used as a monitor if needed.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Matthews
Reviews.Content: I just got this TV and I think it is perfect. Got it for under 100 dollars New.. All the connection work great, sound is excellent. Very very light weight. Excellent picture. Remote has allot of features. One thing I really liked, that is on the remote you can select it to a full screen picture when watching a AVI movie. No issues so far. bedroom, back porch, kitchen, I think it would be perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Susan Sterling
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these... work great, great picture... clearer than my Sony 40" in the den.  You do have to be at the right angle but mine are mounted on versatile wall mounts... so it's no problem.

Reviews.Title: nice little unit
Reviews.Author: Richard Charles Rheaume "Traveling Man"
Reviews.Content: I put this little unit in my boat.  The picture is great.  It is very light weight.  I think it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't recommend
Reviews.Author: Jenni
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for a guest room, the biggest issue I have with this tv is you can only see it if you are sitting right in front of it! Otherwise the screen is black! I had it in front of where the bed is and you can see it if you sit on the bed but once you lay down you can't see the picture. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture.... But
Reviews.Author: MattG "mattg54321"
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on audio, but since the price was right, I bought this TV to use at my boathouse for Saturday football games -- audio is not too important.  TV works fine in the metro area.  With a small antenna the HD picture is nice for such a small set.  I took this to the lake, where the location is partially obstructed by some hills, but I have a large outdoor antenna for better reception.  After hooking this set up to the large antenna, it found 8 stations - mostly the kind you don't watch.  My channel master converter box found 23 with the same antenna.  I am now using this set as a monitor attached to the converter, watching low resolution channels since the tuner is so weak.  Bottom line - poor audio, a tuner that works in metro areas, but is marginal otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Coby TF-TV1525 15" LED TV
Reviews.Author: Hilton
Reviews.Content: Picture is fine if you look stright at it.  The picture fades if you view it from above or below looking straight on.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for very little cash
Reviews.Author: NikkiL
Reviews.Content: I wanted a TV for the kitchen, and did not want it to overwhelm the space.  Very few under-19" available, at any price.  Since this one is so reasonable,  it was a pleasant surprise to see how good the picture is, hooked to cable.  Sharper than my larger TV's!Sound quality is good, not for concert-quality, but no one should expect that from this level product.  Set up was a breeze.  For a small serviceable TV, you won't find better.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the money!
Reviews.Author: rb1947
Reviews.Content: Not a bad little TV for the money.  I can see where people complain about the sound and the picture viewing angle but for the money (I paid $80 with free shipping), you can't beat it.  I did hook it up to my computer speakers but hearing the sound come from one direction and seeing the picture from another is worse than just listening to the TV.  I did set the sound to all bass and no treble and that helped a bunch.  I do have it mounted on a bracket so I can adjust the angle to optimum picture but like I said, for $80 and free freight, I can't complain too loud.  If they get to $ 80 again, I will probably buy another one for the camper.

Reviews.Title: nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Judy C. Jennings "redsnapper"
Reviews.Content: very nice 15 inch screen tvs.the price was just right. items were shipped out immediately. i am very satisfied with this item so i bought two.

Reviews.Title: No picture quality from sideview
Reviews.Author: harvest
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is only good when you are directly in front of it and 8 to 10 ft. away.  If you get closer or look at it off to the side it's dark and has a negative image.  The sound is tinny.  I wanted this for my kitchen, and realize at $99 you get what you pay for.  Not a quality tv that's for sure.  We also blackened in the Coby signature on the front which was so big and visible.

Reviews.Title: Picture great, sound awful
Reviews.Author: jd
Reviews.Content: Well let me say this is the first time I have been motivated to write a product review.  I received the TV last night and set it up.  I have to say that the setup was easy, and the picture looked nice and sharp.  However, the sound on this thing is awful.  I don't know if it's the positioning of the speakers or what, but it sounded like I was trying to listen to the TV from inside a cardboard box.  I had to strain to understand what they were saying on the news.  After about 20 minutes of fiddling with different channels, volume, and other settings, it was clear to my wife and me that we couldn't make use of the TV, so back in the box it went and it was returned today.I wish I had listened to some of the other reviews which said that the sound was poor quality -- it would have saved me some aggravation.  I just did't realize how bad sound quality could get.  Do not buy!

Reviews.Title: Coby TF-TV 1525 15" LCD TV from Amazon.Com
Reviews.Author: PhotogDog "KMW"
Reviews.Content: It arrived today, boy that "Prime One Day shipping for $3.99" really worked this time, very happy. This little TV worked out perfect for my application. Needed a TV/Monitor to use with my Yamaha CD Jukebox/MCX-1000 Digital Audio Server. It uses an on-screen menu for full operation and this TV has been a great mate for my system. All imaging/graphics are outstanding and the sound is great for a little set like this. My sound systems sound is pushed through a full surround sound 16 speaker/double woofer system so the sound from this Coby 15" TV was not a requirement or needed... :-).  The product description did not list that it also had a S-Video connection, just in case you had the question. Amazon shipped it fast, arrived on Saturday and they had the best $$ cost savings out there and this little guy blends in with the rest of my cool sound stuff, a good thing. The gripes I noted by others is unfounded, I use it in a "Sun Room" all windows (Very Bright) and the screen and display is sharp and colorful. Has plenty of volume, and I can read script and detailed information from across the room, about 20 feet. All and all, This little guy can't be beat... Enjoy!  V/R KMW

Reviews.Title: Eh.. A dollar spent is a dollar spent
Reviews.Author: SisiDubb
Reviews.Content: The tv itself is not so bad at all. Its definately for a smaller closer viewing area but it fine for the bed room or a kitchen. The monitor is slighty saggy and what I mean is it didn't hold it's position straight up and down, almost as if it should adjust but rather hangs from the stand.  It's hard to view unless at eye level or slightly above. But for $100 you get what what you pay for. Overall I'm satisfied with my buy shipping as always was super fast and easy

Reviews.Title: Nice little TV!
Reviews.Author: KayJay
Reviews.Content: This little TV has a really great picture, easy to use and perfect for our needs.  I use this to pick up our local TV stations for local weather and news reports.  Bought a small, inexpensive antenna and it picks up our local channels clear as a bell.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for!
Reviews.Author: Doug Dunagan
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TFTV 1525 for my daughter for Christmas. Picture quality is comparable to a 1980's projection TV! You have to be straight in front of it to see the picture. With 4 of her friends over thats hard to do! After having it for 4 months it started having lines across the screen. Its now on the way back to Coby, BTW they charge $25 shipping even on warranty claims! Not at all satisfied, its going to Goodwill!

Reviews.Title: It is as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Mike Berman
Reviews.Content: Because of the space available I needed a screen that was 15 inches or less. I could not find same at any retail outlets - the smallest being 19 inches. The Cody is as promised.

Reviews.Title: Tv
Reviews.Author: Shantel Bennett
Reviews.Content: Omg! This tv is wonderful for my dorm and so easy to set up. Pictures and sound are very clear I would recommend this for any college student. :)

Reviews.Title: Good Little TV
Reviews.Author: John Cunningham
Reviews.Content: Works fine in my bedroor , but I would like more sound . I have to put my hearing aids on to hear it .

Reviews.Title: Coby TF-TV1525 15 in
Reviews.Author: eli10
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV Monitor type. Great picture quality. Only reservation is sound is occasionally tinny and have not been able to eliminate it entirely from all voice patterns. May be due to placement, echos, speakers etc.

Reviews.Title: Channel delay
Reviews.Author: K. Brown "lowoncash"
Reviews.Content: I needed this TV for a small room and it fit the space perfectly. However, when using the remote to change channels there is a delay. I have to wait about 5 seconds when I change the channel. Also there is a little glare on the screen when watching programs.

Reviews.Title: Coby TV 15"
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Rosenberg
Reviews.Content: Horrible sound and picture quality only mediocre.  Sent this one back for a replacement and the replacement wasn't any better.  Will never buy a Coby TV again.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Viewing Angle
Reviews.Author: kay dietz
Reviews.Content: Got this tv as a Christmas present. We chose this TV just because of its small size.  The viewing angle is so bad on this tv that sometimes you cannot see the picure even if you're looking directly at it. If you slouch down in the seat, you cannot see a picture. Also, the sound is terrible--very tinny. It's cheap, but it's not worth having if it were free. Take my advice, don't buy this tv.

Reviews.Title: Never Again!
Reviews.Author: Russell L. Martin
Reviews.Content: I liked the price and compactness of the TV and it worked well for awhile.  Today I was watching a video and a green bar appeared towards the top and will not go away.  I should have learned my lesson before with their DVD players, but that is how life is.  Sometimes remember and sometimes we don't.  Next time, I will buy from a reputible dealer and NOT from Coby.

Reviews.Title: can understand why they updated this model.
Reviews.Author: butch "bh"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is poor. The sound quality is  very poor . If your looking for a pc monitor, its ok , but this should not even be called a tv.

Reviews.Title: Turn on Dangit
Reviews.Author: Wayne O. Howell "coffeemorning"
Reviews.Content: I bought this Coby 15" TV for Christmas for the kitchen.It worked fin for about a week then the problems set in.It would take at least ten tries to turn on. The little blue LED on the unit; when the power button was pressed it would light up like it was going to turn on, but them would turn off then come back on with the standby light then the entire unit powered off. There is absolutely no information in the owners manual. All it says is to unplug for 30 seconds and replug... didn't work. It still take at least 10 tries turn on, can't return it because my son threw away his receipt. The only way I would recommend this TV to another person is they planned to make a camp fire with it. Also even when the TV does come on it has the worst viewing angle I have ever seen. I had to put the TV on a Spool of dental floss the increase the viewing angle. I have never seen a TV that cannot be tilted. So to remedy this problem I will never turn the TV off. Instead I will just put it on a black source like AV so there is just a black screen. This is in fact the worst purchase I have ever made. They did such a great job...making this TV defective. I feel sorry for anybody else who has bought this TV because it is the most unreliable piece of junk I have ever owned. I have owned a small 9-10" TV back from the 70's and it still works just fine, goes to show how cheap these TV companies are getting these days. If your going to buy a TV make sure it is a reliable company like LG or Samsung. I will never buy another Coby product again. The only thing I liked about this TV was the price, $80.00 in store but now I can see why this TV was so cheap, because it is cheap and will break right after you set it up

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: K.R. McDaniel
Reviews.Content: I really love it. It has great picture quality. It does not take up much room.  I would buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Defective LCD TV
Reviews.Author: faydi
Reviews.Content: after 3 days of use the tv doesn't work,it gives sound but the screen is blank,i would like to have another one ,how you can help me please?

Reviews.Title: Problem with under cabinet mounting!
Reviews.Author: old programmer
Reviews.Content: The TV is very clear and the sound is a little tinny like everyone says. With the speakers on the bottom its OK if the sound direction can get to you. MY BIG PROBLEM is that the cable connection is exactly in the middle of the back of the TV such that when mounting it under a cabinet with the 10"-24" Flip Mount from Premier Mounts, the mount is in the way of the cable connection. I cannot connect the cable while the TV is connected to the under cabinet mount. I don't know if this is a problem with other under cabinet mounts sold by Amazon. I hate to have to buy them all the find one thats works. Any suggestions?

Reviews.Title: coby tv
Reviews.Author: Cathy Benton
Reviews.Content: Price right, size right.  Still don't like flat screen tvs, but can't buy real ones any more.  Trying to see it from bed, and you have to be right in front of it or it's like looking at a negative of a photo.  Technology is not always the greatest.  But real tvs were lasting too long.  So now it's buy one that only lasts a few years.

Reviews.Title: TV review
Reviews.Author: Serious reader
Reviews.Content: The TV was broken when it arrived.  It had been shipped in the original manufacturers box, with a label on it.  No padding.  The replacement TV arrived with the manufacturer's packaging inside a well-padded box.  The TV works great.

Reviews.Title: lindo tv
Reviews.Author: ric blanco
Reviews.Content: el producto llego a tiempo, son de muy buena calidad, igual a las fotos, lo recomiendo a toda la comunidad

Reviews.Title: coby 15.5 in color tv
Reviews.Author: mike66
Reviews.Content: wouldnt recommend this purchase to anyone because when I opened the box, there was no power cord,no remote, no base of any kind for the tv to stand up. You would need to purchase a wall mount or under cabinet mount of some kind. Purchased for my son in college for a christmas gift, now have to scramble to find pieces or something different altogether. Way to go,NOT!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Jackie R. Watkins
Reviews.Content: TV works good but if your looking at it from the side the picture is hard to see and sound quality is lame no good

Reviews.Title: What's with the constant logo?
Reviews.Author: ruby
Reviews.Content: The tv works great no problem, but what's annoying is the moment you turn it on you have to see the logo name. I think it's a little ridiculous how we have to repeatly see the logo sign instead of the stations coming on first. How many times do we have to be reminded who made the tv? It saids coby in front of the tv, and now we have to see the logo come on first each and every time? It doesn't happen with any of my other tvs only this one. Too weird.

Reviews.Title: Nice Looking but Sound dealy problems
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: I got this TV to use it in my home office next to my PC but the was a problem, I was having a sound delay between the signal I was getting from the cable and antenna (Yes I did try both)...The remote control is great and the TV show great quality but the sound problem forced me to return it and then I got the one below!https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0028QDO0M?tag=thel003-20&camp;=213381&creative;=390973&linkCode;=as4&creativeASIN;=B0028QDO0M&adid;=165219ZYFBM9AMX7FMQ6&I hope everything is better now.

Reviews.Title: Not Really 15-Inch But More Like 11-Inch TV
Reviews.Author: E. L. McRae
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to use in my teardrop trailer so I can watch DVDs on rainy evenings when camping.I hooked it up to my DVD player and put in a movie. Found out that a widescreen movie on this widescreen TV on Normal Mode (there are 4 modes: Normal, 16:9 Widescreen, 4:3, and Cinema) DOES NOT fill the screen.  There is @1.5-inch black border on the top and bottom, and @2-inch black border on each side.  So essentially, this 15.6-inch screen TV is an 11-inch screen TV.  4:3 Mode looked exactly the same as Normal Mode.  Widescreen Mode stretched everything to the sides but still had @1-inch black border top and bottom, Cinema Mode is useless as probably at least a quarter of the image is lost all around.I called Coby and spoke with someone who advised me that the way to fix this is to buy fullscreen DVD's and play them on Widescreen Mode.  Huh???  Isn't this a widescreen TV??  Shouldn't I be able to buy widescreen DVD's to play on my widescreen TV and it will fill the whole screen??  When we watch DVD's at home on the 32-inch Sanyo, the movies fill the screen.  Why not this one?I'd like to return this but I didn't hook it up for a while, so it's probably been too long.  Not sure how this works on cable because I don't have cable here at my shop.I also sent feedback through the Coby website. Got no response from them.  Should have bought a more reputable brand, I guess.

Reviews.Title: The Worst Product I've Ever Bought
Reviews.Author: Jeff Coatney "film maker"
Reviews.Content: The picture on this "TV" had a bizarre blue cast to the screen. It could not show black. Everywhere there should be black in the picture, there was a bizarre blue cast in the image. As you moved your head from side to side, there was a small portion of the screen that was normal (except the blue for black issue) and the rest of the screen had the look of an photo negative. I tested the sources of the video I was feeding it and it was definitely this monitor.I've bought COBY products before and they are always poor quality, but at least they worked. I mean, when you're on vacation and you just need another set of headphones, $5 bucks is hard to pass up. But even a $99 dollar TV should at least give you a picture. What's the point?  I don't know how this company stays in business. You see their products everywhere from Wal-Mart to Best Buy to here on Amazon, and it just erodes my confidence in the store-- I know that COBY means cheap, but it just drags down Amazon's reputation as a reliable retailer. Amazon should really protect their customers from predatory manufacturers like COBY.Why are you trying to pawn this stuff off on people, Amazon? Don't you have any quality controls when you accept products to sell in your store? I'd really like to know how Amazon gets stuck with pallets and pallets of this crap. In the end, when you see the brand "COBY", run.
